Categories.name: Hair
Categories.description: We take pride to offer one of the best products in the haircare industry. Full range of professional hair care products, high-quality hair colouring and bleaching products. You can choose from proven and well-known brands like JOICO (product lines designed to meet different needs), CLINISCALP, MEDICEUTICALS and BOSLEY (comprehensive range of treatments for scalp disorders), SENSCIENCE (prestige hair care collection), BAIN-DE-TERRE ( hair care line that harnesses the power of nature to help enhance & restore hair health), ISO (function-specific solutions for individual needs) and last but not least EUGENE PERMA (range of sub-brands, dedicated to various aspects of hair color, care and styling).

Categories.name: Skin Care
Categories.description: BABOR’s skin care products are perfectly suited to the requirements of EVERY type of skin. Inspired by the latest advances and technologies in the spheres of research into skin aging, dermatology and genetics, BABOR’s research team has consistently developed and refined highly effective anti-aging product ranges. By adopting a holistic approach and integrating a wide range of different specialist departments, they have succeeded in further unraveling the mystery surrounding the causes of skin aging and ways of combating it. This combination of knowledge and holistic research is the key to the outstanding efficacy of their anti aging product ranges.

Categories.name: Nails
Categories.description: The nail make up from the BABOR FACE DESIGN COLLECTION creates well-cared-for and brilliant fingernails. High-tech formulations induce rapid drying time and durability.

Categories.name: Makeup
Categories.description: The BABOR FACE DESIGN COLLECTION is a range of make-up that unites colour and care and, thanks to the special application technique developed by Peter Schmidinger, the "ARA-Principle", simply highlights the beauty of every single woman.

Products.name: Green Meadow Shampoo
Products.description: Luxuriously cleanse & restore optimal moisture balance of normal to oil hair with lush botanicals for an everyday clean, healthy shine. A lush, paraben-free, color-safe, shampoo infused with balancing extracts from lush green meadows plus precious argan & monoi oils that lavish hair in soft, sumptuous, silky perfection.

Products.name: Passion Flower Conditioner
Products.description: Deep moisturizer that protects color from fading and keeps hair soft, vibrant and shiny. Ideal for color-treated hair that’s normal to dry. A rich, paraben-free, color-protecting conditioner infused with fragrant passion flower plus precious argan & monoi oils that lavish hair in soft, sumptuous, silky perfection

Products.name: Balance Conditioner
Products.description: Milk Thistle Extract, Vitamin B5 and Natural Sugars nourish and maintain a healthy, optimal moisture balance. Leaves hair super manageable and free of build-up. Balance conditioner keeps hair shiny, and luminous.

Products.name: Bi-Phase Moisturizer
Products.description:
BABOR Calming Sensitive Bi-Phase Moisturizer

Calming, moisturising 2-phase care for extremely sensitive skin.

- Well tolerated by extremely sensitive skin.

- Provides instant calmness to the skin.

- Strengthens the skin's own lipid barrier.

- Results in an immediately calm, relaxed and supple complexion.

Intensive moisturising and lipid-replenishing product for very dry, sensitive skin. Hypoallergenic and free from colourants, fragrance, preservatives and emulsifying agents. This product can be used as a 24hr care or additional care for dry, very sensitive skin. The skin is visibly relaxed and immediately calmed.

Application: Shake well before use until the two parts have been mixed fully. Then pour the emulsion onto your hands and apply to face, neck and décolleté, morning and/or evening, after cleansing. Can be applied under day and/or night cream as an additional moisturiser.

Products.name: Babor Men Shaving Foam
Products.description:
BABOR Men Shaving Foam

The unique shaving experience - thorough and gentle.

-	Creamy shaving foam for a daily wet shave. 
-	Delivers a close shave without redness or irritations.

This velvety shaving cream with the innovative TAUREC® active complex gives a unique shaving experience. It allows for the razor blade to glide very gently over the skin for a smooth, close shave.

Application: Spray a little in the palm of your hand and smooth over dampened shaving area. Shave in direction of hair growth. Rinse off excess with water.

Fresh and maintained all day long

-	An alcohol-free, skin-friendly stick deodorant 
-	Regulates perspiration and provides long-lasting protection against body odor

An alcohol-free deodorant stick with a fresh, masculine fragrance. Regulates perspiration and provides reliable protection against body odor, hour after hour. For the perfect start - and finish - to the day.
Products.name: Fresh & Dry Deo Stick
Vitalizing Hair And Body Shampoo
Products.description:
BABOR Men Vitalizing Hair And Body Shampoo

-	A refreshing, vitalising shower gel that doubles as a shampoo. 
-	For a pleasantly fresh and vital start to the day.

Cleanses the skin gently and protects against dehydration. Also ideal for use as a daily shampoo.

Products.name: Nail Treatment Oil
Products.description: Quick drying, long lasting and combines high gloss and simple application in an innovative high-tech formula.

Products.name: Advanced Nail White
Products.description: Innovative nail polish for a subtle french manicure look. A visual brightener gives blemished nails a whiter appearance with the visual aesthetic of a French manicure. This high-tech formula does not contain methylbenzene or formaldehyde.

Products.name: Smart All In One Polish
Products.description: BABOR Nail make-up Smart All in One Nourishing and strengthening multifunction polish with minerals Multifunctional treatment polish with minerals. Excellent for use as a base or finishing coat, colour sealer, nail strengthener, or to freshen up color shine. Made with strong minerals. Dries in seconds for sustainable wear through the toughest of challenges. Silicon, zinc, copper, iron and magnesium provide care for the nail, even on application. It does not contain toluol or formaldehyde.
BABOR Nail make-up Nail Colour Remover Extra gentle, acetone free nail polish remover.
Products.name: Nail Colour Remover
Shaping Cuticle & Nail Repair
Products.description:
BABOR Shaping Cuticle & Nail Repair

Rich, intensive care for the nails and cuticles.

-	Promotes nail growth, thereby strengthening nails and cuticles. 
-	Nails remain elastic and do not chip or break.

A very rich nail cream for the intensive care of the nails and cuticles. Natural active ingredients encourage nail growth and promote stronger nails. They also condition the cuticles and keep the nails elastic, making them less prone to breaking.

Application: Place a little cream on the lower part of the nail. Using circling movements, massage into the cuticle and into the nail, working upwards.

Products.name: Super Soft Eye Shadow
Products.description:
BABOR Eye make-up Super Soft Eye Shadow

A silky, extra-fine mat eye shadow.

-	Ultra soft texture 
-	Latest fashionable colors

The innovative and long-lasting formula combines intensive color with excellent coverage.

Products.name: Super Soft Duo Blush
Products.description:
BABOR Face make-up Super Soft Duo Blush

Duo colour powder blush with filler effect

-	Protects, treats and regenerates

Dual colour powder blush with a filler effect contains different sized powder particles that fill up lines, giving the face an even complexion. With the two colours, you can effectively brighten and add shadows. Protects, treats and regenerates thanks to its lifting complex consisting of sea fennel, lupines oil, vitamin E and the moisturizing amino acid complex L-PCA.

Products.name: Maxi Definition Eye Contour Pencil
Products.description:
BABOR Eye make-up Maxi Definition Eye Contour Pencil

A long-Lasting and waterproof eye pencil.

-	Long-lasting and waterproof 
-	Excellent colour delivery and coverage 
-	Supplies moisture and promotes skin regeneration 
-	Comes with a practical sponge smudger

An extremely long-lasting, waterproof eyeliner with excellent colour delivery and coverage. Ceramide III and pearl proteins supply moisture and promote skin regeneration. Comes with a practical sponge smudger.

Products.name: Kabuki Brush
Products.description:
BABOR FDC Kabuki Brush for Mineral Powder Foundation

A compact, soft full brush for loose mineral foundation.

Kabuki Brush for Mineral Powder Foundation makes applying mineral foundation seamless and flawless, with the full rounded top. Pigment easily adheres to the dense, gentle bristles, giving you control over your coverage. The chic, short golden handle takes little effort to handle, so you can achieve a beautiful buff.

Products.name: Ultra Shine Lip Gloss
Products.description:
BABOR Ultra Shine Lip Gloss

Adds volume and a brilliant shine to lips.

Ultra brilliant lip gloss with light reflections protect sensitive lips against environmental stress. This non-sticky lip gloss nourishes and regenerates for fabulous looking lips.

Products.name: Maxi Volume Mascara
Products.description:
BABOR Eye make-up Maxi Volume Mascara

3D mascara for length, curl and volume

-	Perfectly forming mascara with a 3D-volume-effect. 
-	Innovative elastomeric brush provides volume and perfect lash definition. 
-	Combs and separates lashes so that eyes appear bigger 
-	Black - water-resistant

Perfectly forming mascara with a 3D-volume-effect. Innovative elastomeric brush provides more volume and guarantees perfect lash definition. Mascara combs and separates the eyelash from the beginnings to the end so that the eyes appear bigger. Fineness and flexibility of the brush allow a precise usage for an extraordinary length and a perfect in form verve. Provitamin B5 provides moisture while sweet almond extract restructures and covers the eyelashes protectively.

Products.name: Joico Super Shine 100ml
Products.description:
Joico Style & Finish Super Shine Glossing Polish

Smoothens and polishes all hair types, imparting brilliant, color enhancing shine. Can also be used to spot detail as a finishing touch for separation and definition. Gives UV-protection.

Work best when:

-	Using small amounts on fingertips to spot-apply on dry hair

-	Apply before blow-drying to create maximum shine
